title: The Ominous Pawnshop
author: verias
text: I thought about doing more with this, but I decided a nice establishing shot would work well for what's about to come up next. How are you guys liking William's little adventure (and funny sidequest) so far?

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: I admit, I'm confused on how pretty much anything William would be interested in is even IN our Arcana. Or how the owner of the place got in touch with him.
